contents: Article 9 (Membership and Withdrawal) ① Sports organizations that wish to become members of the Sports Association in accordance with Article 7 must apply for membership to the Sports Association and become members of the Sports Association after passing the following resolutions., 1. Regular member organizations must meet at the general meeting. Resolution, 2. Associate member organizations and recognized organizations are resolved by the Board of Directors, ② Member organizations may withdraw from the Sports Association by submitting a letter of withdrawal., ③ Membership and withdrawal shall be determined separately.
